_sText:
Ok my 6th map now.
First one thing...
To play this map you need a "fast" server.
You cannot play it on a "laptop server" etc. because it takes much resources.

And now some informations:
-More than 70Spawnpoints
-Background music (NeXuS - NeXuS Paradize)
-Skybox (train_hdr)

Description:
Each team spawns one one side of the map with no equip.
In the middle is a big hole and on each side are obliques.
Each team will spawn on one oblique.
Some time later, balls will spawn on each side in random intervals.
But they will spawn faster and faster.
In order to stay alive, you have to dodge the balls.
The team, who is alive when the other team is dead, will win and a new round will start.

Note: Google Translator ftw :D
